verses.verse: Remember <WH2142>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, what is come upon us <WH7200>: Behold, and see <WH7200> our reproach <WH2781>.
Our inheritance <WH5159> is turned <WH2015> unto strangers <WH2114>, Our houses <WH1004> unto aliens <WH5237>.
We are orphans <WH3490> and fatherless <WH369>; Our mothers <WH517> are as widows <WH490>.
We have drunken <WH8354> our water <WH4325> for money <WH3701>; Our wood <WH6086> is sold unto us <WH935>.
Our pursuers <WH7291> are upon our necks <WH6677>: We are weary <WH3021>, and have no rest <WH5117>.
We have given <WH5414> the hand <WH3027> to the Egyptians <WH4714>, And to the Assyrians <WH804>, to be satisfied <WH7646> with bread <WH3899>.
Our fathers <WH1> sinned <WH2398>, and are not <WH369>; And we have borne <WH5445> their iniquities <WH5771>.
Servants <WH5650> rule <WH4910> over us <WH6561>: There is none to deliver us out of their hand <WH3027>.
We get <WH935> our bread <WH3899> at the peril of our lives <WH5315>, Because <WH6440> of the sword <WH2719> of the wilderness <WH4057>.
Our skin <WH5785> is black <WH3648> like an oven <WH8574>, Because <WH6440> of the burning <WH2152> heat of famine <WH7458>.
They ravished <WH6031> the women <WH802> in Zion <WH6726>, The virgins <WH1330> in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>.
Princes <WH8269> were hanged up <WH8518> by their hand <WH3027>: The faces <WH6440> of elders <WH2205> were not honored <WH1921>.
The young men <WH970> bare <WH5375> the mill <WH2911>; And the children <WH5288> stumbled <WH3782> under the wood <WH6086>.
The elders <WH2205> have ceased <WH7673> from the gate <WH8179>, The young men <WH970> from their music <WH5058>.
The joy <WH4885> of our heart <WH3820> is ceased <WH7673>; Our dance <WH4234> is turned <WH2015> into mourning <WH60>.
The crown <WH5850> is fallen <WH5307> from our head <WH7218>: Woe <WH188> unto us <WH2398>! for we have sinned.
For this our heart <WH3820> is faint <WH1739>; For these things our eyes <WH5869> are dim <WH2821>;
For the mountain <WH2022> of Zion <WH6726>, which is desolate <WH8074>: The foxes <WH7776> walk upon it <WH1980>.
Thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah, abidest <WH3427> for ever <WH5769>; Thy throne <WH3678> is from generation <WH1755> to generation <WH1755>.
Wherefore dost thou forget <WH7911> us for ever <WH5331>, And forsake <WH5800> us so long <WH753> time <WH3117>?
Turn <WH7725> thou us unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, and we shall be turned <WH7725>; Renew <WH2318> our days <WH3117> as of old <WH6924>.
But thou hast utterly <WH3988> rejected <WH3988> us <WH3966>; Thou art very wroth against us <WH7107>.
